name: Take Me to Your Liter
description:
Take Me to Your Liter is a local multiplayer two-player game made in Unity over the course of about six weeks for a class (technically longer, but major aspects were scrapped and reworked, so it's essentially a different game). Move your ship to abduct humans, and attack your opponent to make them drop humans and launch their ship across the map. Drop off humans in the jar at the bottom to score, the person with the most humans dropped off wins!

Full 360 gamepad support, unknown support for anything else.

✗✗✗✗✗✗✗✗✗✗✗✗✗✗✗✗✗

Let us know what you think on twitter! @nathanwentworth + @kieran_grealish
